channel.title: Pi making npc give an item at dialogue
channel.description:
Okay so working on a small easter event for a server...this is what I got so far
Dialoguehandler.java
[code]case 48: sendNpcChat4("Hello!", "I am the Easter Bunny and it's your lucky day!", "I ate all the chocolate so have this item.", "Happy Easter from -name of server here- Staff!", c.talkingNpc, "Easter Bunny"); break;[/code]
Actionhandler.java
[code]case 1835: c.getDH().sendDialogues(48,npcType); break;[/code]
Clickingbuttons.java [code]} else if(c.dialogueAction == 48) { c.getItems().addItem(1037,1);[/code]
Okay so I get the dialogue part...but why isn't the npc giving me the item? ( thats the 1037 , bunny ears if interested lol)
I don't know why the npc doesn't give the item though...
help please.
Oh yeah this is a pi

@Loveandpower wrote:

Thanks was just adding in wrong spot:)

item.title: Pi making npc give an item at dialogue
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

just do

case 48: sendNpcChat4("Hello!", "I am the Easter Bunny and it's your lucky day!", "I ate all the chocolate so have this item.", "Happy Easter from -name of server here- Staff!", c.talkingNpc, "Easter Bunny"); c.getItems().addItem(1037,2); break;

Read full topic

@Loveandpower wrote:

Okay so working on a small easter event for a server…this is what I got so far

Dialoguehandler.java

case 48: sendNpcChat4("Hello!", "I am the Easter Bunny and it's your lucky day!", "I ate all the chocolate so have this item.", "Happy Easter from -name of server here- Staff!", c.talkingNpc, "Easter Bunny"); break;

Actionhandler.java

case 1835: c.getDH().sendDialogues(48,npcType); break;

Clickingbuttons.java

} else if(c.dialogueAction == 48) { c.getItems().addItem(1037,1);

Okay so I get the dialogue part…but why isn’t the npc giving me the item? ( thats the 1037 , bunny ears if interested lol)

I don’t know why the npc doesn’t give the item though…
